text.div:
ICD-11 to SNOMED CT mappings for COVID-19 vaccines (https://who-int.github.io/svc/ConceptMap/who-ddcc-map-icd11-sct-vaccines)

Mapping from http://id.who.int/icd11/mms to http://snomed.info/sct

DRAFT (not intended for production usage). Published on 2021-04-23 by World Health Organization (WHO) (https://www.who.int).

Rule-based mappings between ICD-11 and SNOMED CT for COVID-19 Vaccines


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
XM68M6is equivalent to111930505
XM0GQ8is equivalent to1119349007 (Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 mRNA only vaccine product)

name: ICD-11 to SNOMED CT mappings for COVID-19 vaccines
